summary: TAKATA RECALL, GOT A RECALL FOR PASSENEGER AIRBAG RECALL WHICH SAID DON'T LET ANYONE RIDE IN PASSENGER SEAT UNITL REPLACED WHICH I DID THE PART TOOK OVER 6 MONTHS TO GET IN TOOK THE CAR IN HAD THE PASSENGER AIRBAG REPLACED. YESTERDAY I GOT IN THE MAIL ANOTHER RECALL FOR THE DRIVERS AIRBAG RECALL , BUT IT SAYS AWAITING PARTS WILL BE AVAILABLE IN SPRING 2018!! REASON FOR RECALL THE AIRBAG CAN RUPTURE IN A CRASH WHICH COULD RESULT IN METAL SHRAPNEL STRIKING THE DRIVER OT OTHER OCCUPANTS IN THE VEHICLE, WHICH CAN CAUSE SERIOUS INJURY OR DEATH!! WHY IN THE HELL DID I RECEIVE TWO SEPARATE RECALLS FOR THE AIRBAGS , SEEMS TO ME THEY SHOULD HAVE RECALLED THEM AT THE SAME TIME.I COMMUTE IN THE CAR WHAT AM I SUPPOSE TO DO?SAYS TO CALL NISSAN DEALERSHIP FOR DETAILS IF I REQUIRE ALTERNATE TRANSPORTATION  OR COMPLIMENTARY LOANER VEHICLE UPON REQUEST..ARE YOU SERIOUS YOU THINK THEY ARE GOINT T O GIVE ME A LOANER VEHICLE TILL THE SPRING? WILL CALL THEM MONDAY BUT WE ALREADY KNOW THE ANSWER TO THAT RIGHT!!OUTRAGED IT WASN'T RECALLED AT THE SAME TIME INSTEAD OF TWO SEPARATE RECALLS..I GOT TO GET TO WORK WHAT AM I SUPPOSE TO DO?!!!
